name: Hardcore Cave Painting
description:
What would you do if you had to kill the very things you're trying to protect? Find out in Hardcore Cave Painting!

Prevent your town from dying out to the hideous beasts! Unfortunately your only weapon is powered by the townsfolk themselves!

Suck up your friends, shoot down your enemies, and keep your town alive!

Your "ammunition" will only spawn on healthy inked ground near the houses, so make sure to shoot it back to life if it's become corrupted.

(MacOS build coming soon)

## Controls

Movement: WASD
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Left Click
"Reload": Right Click
Mute the background music: M
